summary: An email from Jill Greenfield, a partner at the law firm Fieldfisher, to an unnamed recipient regarding a client who wishes to speak to the recipient about managing an unspecified matter, possibly related to travel. The email is brief and appears to be setting up a communication.

persons.name: Jill Greenfield
persons.context: Author of the email, acting on behalf of an unnamed client who wishes to speak to the recipient about managing an unspecified matter.

locations: Riverbank House, 2 Swan Lane, London EC4R 3TT, England
keyFacts: The email is from Jill Greenfield of Fieldfisher law firm, dated September 15, 2020.
Greenfield states her client wishes to speak to the recipient about how they would 'manage this,' a subject left unspecified.
The client also inquired if the recipient was traveling, suggesting potential coordination of schedules or a location-sensitive matter.
The document is a standard legal correspondence with confidentiality disclaimers.
The subject line and context hint the communication may be related to the Epstein case, but the specific matter is not detailed.
